short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension to turn off/on Buy It Now for all of your items on Grailed.com!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It's a pain to turn off Buy It now for every single item on when going on vacation! With Grailed Vacation Mode it only takes one button press to turn off Buy It Now for all your items.
